storyInfo: New on the job at the Notarial Hall, Richele is tasked to deliver a document that could 'throw Laterano into chaos.'

attributes.content: The paperwork's done.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Good work, rookie.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Just doing my job. How's the old man doing?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: There's nothing more the doctors can do for him.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Which is to say...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What's our job now? Executing the citizen's will in our capacity as executors?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Of course. It's our most important duty.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Speaking of wills... Richele! Attention!
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Y-Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: That's more like it. Look alive when you're working!
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: I know it's your first mission and I don't want to put unnecessary pressure on you. However...
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: This is a secret mission, Richele.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: A secret mission?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes. Take this.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: The veteran executor takes out a sealed envelope, then tears a page out of her notebook and writes an address on it.
Then she solemnly gives the envelope and the note to the rookie.
Time is of the essence. Deliver this document to this address today. You'll need to leave immediately.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: There will be someone there to receive it.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I can't tell you. Discretion is crucial for an executor.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: But I can tell you that this is an important mission. The contents of the document could throw all of Laterano into chaos.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Throw all of Laterano into chaos...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Seriously?)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: But I'm new on the job. Is this really a task I should be entrusted with?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Isn't it more suited to a veteran, like you...?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I have other urgent matters to attend to. You're the only one I can count on.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: You passed the Notarial Hall's entrance exam. You've proven your mettle. Now it's time to show it.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Is this how promotion exams work in the Notarial Hall?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Promotion exam?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Er, well, yes! Complete this mission, and you'll be a proper Executor!
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I guess I'll set out now, if you put it that way.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Take care!
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: I will... try...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Good luck, rookie.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: (This address is in the outskirts.)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (The fastest way would be to go straight down this street and just keep going.)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Before that, though...)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Did you know? There's a new shop in Pagus Stevonus. They say it sells the best donuts in town!
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: I got in line in the morning and bought two. Try it out!
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: Ah, I've tried it before. It's not bad, but...
attributes.name: Laid-Back Passerby

attributes.content: But what? Are you going to keep me guessing?
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: Old Darian's donuts are the best. Even better than the new shop.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Passerby

attributes.content: I tried it once, and I could never forget it.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Passerby

attributes.content: Really? I don't believe you.
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: Hey, man, try this donut! I guarantee it's the best you've ever had.
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: Who? Me?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm in a hurry. Ask someone else.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hey! Wait up!
attributes.name: Laid-Back Passerby

attributes.content: It won't take long...
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: The executor-in-training's hand moves instinctively, but he drops it back down.
Richele face twitches a little.
Sorry, I really am in a hurry.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Wait...!
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: (Damn, he's fast!)
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: (After him! Don't let him get away!)
attributes.name: Laid-Back Passerby

attributes.content: *pant*...*pant*....
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: I... I'm out of breath... where did he go?
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: No idea... he can run...
attributes.name: Laid-Back Passerby

attributes.content: I told you that wouldn't work... getting close to him while pretending to chat like that...
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: We should have stopped him and taken it by force!
attributes.name: Chatting Passerby

attributes.content: Now's not the time for that! I... I've notified the others.
attributes.name: Laid-Back Passerby

attributes.content: After him!
attributes.name: Laid-Back Passerby

attributes.content: So they were after me...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Or, to be more specific, what I'm carrying.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: The only thing I can think of is this confidential document.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I expected something, but not so soon... how did they know who I was and where I was?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: It sounds like there are others...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (...! Who is it this time?)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Excuse me, Senior.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member

attributes.content: Someone just reported a robbery around here.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member

attributes.content: Did you see anyone suspicious?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member

attributes.content: No idea, I'm just passing by.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Is it a coincidence that he's standing in my way?)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: As the only potential witness right now, I must ask you to cooperate...
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm in a hurry!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member

attributes.content: Excuse me!
attributes.name: Cleric

attributes.content: Is something troubling you? Is there anything I can help you with?
attributes.name: Cleric

attributes.content: (Another one.)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Well... the situation right now is kind of troubling.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Sorry, but I really have to be going.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hold it right there!
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member?

attributes.content: We can't let you go.
attributes.name: Cleric?

attributes.content: Er... what do you mean?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: No need to play dumb. You know what we're after.
attributes.name: Cleric?

attributes.content: Hand it over!
attributes.name: Cleric?

attributes.content: (Well, well, well... what do we have here?)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (On the other hand, I don't sense any real hostility in their expression. What is going on with this mission?)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Well, it's my first ever job...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I can't screw it up.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Do we do it?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member?

attributes.content: Let's see what a Notarial Hall Executor's gun is like.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member?

attributes.content: Could we avoid causing so much commotion in the middle of town?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Bare hands will do.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I've reviewed your Pontifica Cohors record.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: You've proven to be an outstanding soldier.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Gratias.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Are you satisfied with being just that?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You've done your job well, but one soldier more or less makes no difference to Laterano.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: We didn't bring you back from that Siracusan town because we wanted a soldier.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: What do you think of Laterano?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: It... it's a fine place.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Much better than I expected, in fact. Not just the prosperity... but also a certain order that permeates everyone's lives.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Our Commandments?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I guess.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Sometimes people want to blow up decorations on the streets, and people like to watch it, but that's not such a bad thing.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What I mean is...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Not the kind of bad thing where people get hurt, people die, and even those who aren't hurt or dead see their lives destroyed.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I like this place.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Okay, now I should be fine.)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (I can stuff someone into a trash bin, right? As long as they're alive, right? Yeah, I'm sure that's cool...)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Secret mission, robbers in the middle of the street... is that what life in Laterano is like?)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Wow...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (First mission ever, and it's a hot mess...)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Maybe I could get a transfer back to the Pontifica Cohors.)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Get the stuff to the destination, and then... hm?)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Another one.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: S-Stop right there!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: You shall not pass... er, well, just stop!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: Hand it over!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: (Hm?)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (No sign of professional training. Not what you would expect from someone trying to rob an executor.)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Is this a disguise in itself? Something doesn't feel right...)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Pardon me, but what do you mean?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: The envelope in your hands!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: This one? I'm afraid I can't assent to handing it over.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: It's my job, after all.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Well, I can't back off either...
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: If you won't hand it over, then I'll have to take it by force!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: Hey! Violence is bad!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Argh... let go of me!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: I'm afraid I can't.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Your form was messy. Your footwork was poor, and the delivery was sloppy.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I thought self-defense was part of compulsory Lateran education. How did you graduate?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I passed the class! It's not like I'm working any dangerous jobs...
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: Let me go!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: Not working any dangerous jobs?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I would say trying to rob an executor is plenty dangerous.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: How about this: You tell me who sent you, and who else is involved, and I let you go?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I-I can't!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: I can't tell you. You don't know what you're dealing with...
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: I heard it was something that could 'throw all Laterano into chaos.'
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Some sort of weapon blueprint?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You could say that...
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm not talking! Don't even bother!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: You're right. This is what sets Laterano apart from the rest.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: You said Laterano was special. What about yourself?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I'm Sankta... so I guess I'm Lateran?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: That's not enough.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Let's go to the Notarial Hall. I'll write you a letter of recommendation.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Be more than a spectator. Experience the life of a true Lateran yourself.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: The life of a true Lateran...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I think you'll like it.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I've already been delayed too long.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Things would be much easier if we weren't in Laterano... I'm not sure I like all this complicated stuff.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Wh-What do you mean?
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: What I mean is...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: The trainee executor draws the gun from his waist and regretfully presses it against the youth's forehead.
It's such a beautiful day. I didn't want to have to do this.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hello, this is the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: The commission? Our executor is on it. It will be done today.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: ...Complications?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Understood. I will deal with it immediately.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: No worries. Richele may be a rookie, and he has much to learn, but...
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: I trust him. He'll complete the mission.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: ...I, I'm alive?
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: Whoa! It's gonna fall!
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: H-He shot through the pillar? That's crazy...
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: He almost broke my arm...
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: Hey, it's me.
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: Sorry, I couldn't stop him.
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: I told you, how was I supposed to stop an Executor?
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: Well, I think we worked hard enough to make Old Darian happy.
attributes.name: Nervous Youth

attributes.content: (Whew, almost didn't hold back...)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (This is Laterano. I have to do things the Lateran way.)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Phew...)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Almost there.)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Salve.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: (There's no one else here. There's no mistake, right?)
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Are you the recipient of this will?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes, I am.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: Thank you for delivering it.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: Just doing my job.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: This is the envelope I was asked to deliver.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Are you not curious what's inside?
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: I heard it's important.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes, yes. Very important and precious...
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: Is it really something I should know?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: The value of something doesn't lie in the number of people who know it or possess it.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: I'll read it out once everyone is here.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: You're reading it in public?!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hehe...
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: Go ahead, open it.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: One egg, three tablespoons of sugar, yeast...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: One cup of flour, two tablespoons of maple syrup...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: A donut recipe?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes. A nice one, isn't it?
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: This is what my husband gave me when he proposed to me.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: My family and friends chased him all the way. You should have seen him when he finally made it to me.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: Your husband was the decedent?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: We didn't have any children. Not that it was ever a problem. We were happy together, the two of us.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: But we didn't want the recipe to be lost once we're gone from Laterano.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: Was there a need to hide it from the executor too, though?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: So, those people who tried to stop me were all part of the plan?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Consider it an old man's last little game.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: I'm sure he thought I didn't know and wanted to give me a surprise, so that the recipe could be passed on to the next generation over the sound of cheering...
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: Here, have a donut.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: I'm sure you'll like it.
attributes.name: Elegant Old Lady

attributes.content: How was it?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Sorry I couldn't tell you the truth. That was part of the client's will.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: I still don't understand...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Why do Laterans do this sort of thing, even though it's completely unnecessary?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You said you liked sweet stuff, just like pretty much everyone else in Laterano.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: The old man overheard you saying it, which was why he asked for you to deliver the recipe.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: It would be even better if you learned it and made those donuts regularly.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: That's how Laterans are. And you can expect more of this, if you stay on the job.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Not happy about it?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: On the contrary...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I love it.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Excellent!
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: Congratulations on a job well done, rookie!
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official
